title: Remove 'Tjenester' from nav menu and update Internet Identity description for II 2.0

requirements.text: Remove the 'Tjenester' (Services) item from the navigation menu in Header.tsx so it no longer appears in either the desktop or mobile menu.
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Tjenester' link is not visible in the desktop navigation bar
The 'Tjenester' link is not visible in the mobile navigation menu
All other existing nav items remain intact

requirements.text: Update the Internet Identity description text (wherever it appears in the app, e.g. LandingPage.tsx, PublicSubmissionForm.tsx, ClientPortal.tsx) to reflect Internet Identity 2.0 capabilities: support for passkeys, Google, Apple, and Microsoft sign-in, replacing any outdated description.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths)
